title: Almost 4 years and still no new Swain skin

embed.description: Trivia Swain was designed by Coronach., Swain was the first champion to be announced and then reworked before he went live. As shown in his Champion Spotlight, Torment's damage over time was increased by the amount of damage taken in its duration., Nevermove is a reference to the narrative poem The Raven, by Edgar Allan Poe.

body: It has been almost 4 years since swain got a new skin (Tyrant Swain) and as far as i know Riot hasn't stated anything about an upcoming rework so there's no reason for him not to have one but, I've come to the conclusion that it's because not as many people would buy it because not as many people play Swain and Riot only wants to make skins that will make them even more filthy rich so we'll probably never get one unless they do the classic over buff him release new skin to bait players into buying the skin then nerf him.
